channel.title: ForeX-Pk Developed team
channel.description:
ForeX-PK
welcome to the ForeX-PK development team page. ForeX-PK is a Pi with allot features and fun. My name is Xion and need some good partners that could help me and support ForeX-PK. I would like so you dont say some stuff like ''Shit,Leech and others bad words'' I approve so its a leech of DSPK But i will add contents and other stuff to make a unique and a powerful Pi but for that i need help.
[Positions] [Coders] Server-side Coder: Me , Open Client-side Coder: Open
[Website/Forums] Website/Forums Manager: Me
[Publicity] Head Publicist: Open
What Each Job Does...
Server Coder: As server coder you will be working to update server contents to make it more stable and adding some updates to it.
Client-Side Coder: As client side coder you will be making the webclient, adding models to the client files and keeping it updated to your best ability.
Website Manager: Your job will be to work alongside me making the website and forums,I already Setup SMF and i am planing some other stuff to it.
Publicity: Your job will to create gfx, banners, and ads. You will need to spread the news of our server. You will stimulate the community. You are the head of all publicity.
Application Format Name: Msn\Aol\Skype\teamviewer\etc: What you are applying for: Why do you think that your the right person for the job: How long you could stay online:
Updated Features: New Home. Pking area 3 Bugs fixed
Media(Have no time to make more): [URL=http://img690.imageshack.us/i/capturetvg.png/][IMG]http://img690.imageshack.us/img690/5415/capturetvg.th.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img156.imageshack.us/i/capture1uz.png/][IMG]http://img156.imageshack.us/img156/8503/capture1uz.th.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img337.imageshack.us/i/capture2d.png/][IMG]http://img337.imageshack.us/img337/4998/capture2d.th.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img407.imageshack.us/i/capture3c.png/][IMG]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/1165/capture3c.th.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img338.imageshack.us/i/capture4of.png/][IMG]http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/2015/capture4of.th.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img8.imageshack.us/i/capture5z.png/][IMG]http://img8.imageshack.us/img8/3368/capture5z.th.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img413.imageshack.us/i/capture6v.png/][IMG]http://img413.imageshack.us/img413/594/capture6v.th.png[/img][/URL] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nuLYgnlEm0M
Contact me on Moparscape Forums or Artem5432@hotmail.com
And yeah i copied the devo page from Rune Anarchy (i have no time to make mine) :(

item.title: ForeX-Pk Developed team
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“X Entinity X, post:15, topic:377753”][quote author=Kaex link=topic=473640.msg3463898#msg3463898 date=1294751154]
Goodluck, but DSPK is a pretty much finished project. Not much you can do people will still think leech. Maybe remove the 525 chars, just stop the models being preloaded in client.java and that should work. Goodluck.
[/quote]

That’s not true, no Server is pretty much “finished.” There’s still so much you can do, like re-writing the combat, implementing basic Minigames, re-writing the Network, re-writing Skills, etc so much.

@OP - Goodluck.[/quote]
Your are right and Thanks btw.

[quote=“Kaex, post:14, topic:377753”][quote author=artem543 link=topic=473640.msg3463933#msg3463933 date=1294756112]
i will do all that i can to make it more good. i am planing much things on it.
[/quote]

Ah good, but honestly remove them fucked up chars and the loaders for them. They’re pathetic I mean if people want the char so much, do a 525 lol.[/quote]
I will try this but what you mean about Char?

Read full topic

@X_Entinity_X wrote:

Kaex:

Goodluck, but DSPK is a pretty much finished project. Not much you can do people will still think leech. Maybe remove the 525 chars, just stop the models being preloaded in client.java and that should work. Goodluck.

That’s not true, no Server is pretty much “finished.” There’s still so much you can do, like re-writing the combat, implementing basic Minigames, re-writing the Network, re-writing Skills, etc so much.

@OP - Goodluck.

Read full topic
